projects.title: Simon Game
projects.bodyText:
- The Simon Game is a classic memory game where players must repeat a sequence of button presses.
 -  This web-based version of the Simon Game was created using **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript**, with **jQuery** for DOM manipulation.

projects.title: Portfolio V2
projects.bodyText:
- I put together this website by playing around with **flexbox**, **grid**, and **Bootstrap**.  
It's been a fun learning experience! I'm still learning, but I know there's more cool stuff to come. Improvements are just around the corner!.
